alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:36AM CDT until May 15 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL MCPHERSON AND MARION COUNTIES... At 735 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hillsboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, Marion, Galva, Canton, Florence, Goessel, Lehigh, Durham, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury, Marion Lake and Pilsen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
